title: Enable publishing: fix production build blockers and add a publish readiness check

requirements.text: Fix any frontend build/type/lint errors that could block production publishing, including removing unused imports in the React codebase so the production build completes successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend` production build completes successfully with no TypeScript errors.
No ESLint/TS unused import issues remain in committed code (e.g., remove unused `useEffect` import in `frontend/src/App.tsx`).

requirements.text: Add a minimal backend “publish readiness” API that confirms the canister is callable (e.g., a query that returns the caller principal and a simple canister status string), and wire a small frontend UI section that calls it and displays the result in English.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes at least one query method that returns the caller Principal (or its text form) and a static status/version string.
Frontend provides a visible UI element (e.g., on the landing page or a small diagnostics panel) that triggers the call and renders success/failure states in English.
When run anonymously, the readiness check still returns a valid response (showing the anonymous principal) without crashing.

requirements.text: Add a concise “How to publish” help section in the frontend UI with clear English instructions specific to publishing this app after a successful build, including a short troubleshooting note for deployment failures.
acceptanceCriteria: The app includes a clearly labeled section such as “How to publish” with step-by-step guidance in English.
The help text includes a brief troubleshooting checklist focused on common causes like build failures and missing assets, without referencing unsupported third-party platforms.
No backend changes are required to view this help content.

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; place all Motoko logic in `backend/main.mo`.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or any other paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Adding real-time features (WebSockets/push notifications) as part of publishing.
